title: Innovative New Golf Ball Massage Launches at Four Seasons Resort Mauritius at AnahitaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Innovative New Golf Ball Massage Launches at Four Seasons Resort Mauritius at Anahita Published on : Friday, September 25, 2015
Perhaps better known for its rolling properties on the greens than on the body, a golf ball may not be the first thought for a massage instrument, yet with a custom-designed Kaddy golf ball roller, Four Seasons Resort Mauritius at Anahita is launching a new spa treatment for those seeking soothing from a deep tissue massage.
Focusing on the back of the body and key muscles exercised on the golf course, the Golf Ball Massage is not only a restorative treatment for golfing enthusiasts, but is also able to target knotted areas of tension in the back and shoulders through the smooth rolling motion of the golf ball.
Pedro Catarino, Director of the Spa at Four Seasons Resort Mauritius at Anahita, comments: “This innovative new massage approach may seem unusual, yet the smooth rolling of the golf ball actually makes this a wonderful massage implement for easing tense and knotted muscles. It is the perfect treatment for post-golfing recovery, or even for non-golfers who are seeking the relief of a deep tissue massage.”
Available as a 90 or 120 minute treatment with full body stretching, the Golf Ball Massage helps boosts circulation while easing sore muscles and repairing muscle tissue to aid mobility. Four Seasons Resort Mauritius at Anahita is home to an Ernie Els Design golf course and all guests may enjoy unlimited, complimentary play throughout their stay.
